Naja'tu Bala Muhammad (onye amụrụ na 1956) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchichi nke Naijiria

Ọ bụ nwanyi mbụ nwere mmeri nke ọkwa Senate nke Kano State (Kano Senatorial Seat in Central District). Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime nwanyi mbụ nogoro n'ọkwa dika onye isi ndii 'National Students Union Nigeria' na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria (ABU) bụkwara nwanyi mbụ na-esote onye isi President of the National Association of Nigerian Students (NANS).
Muhammed bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke Dr Bala Muhammed, onye ndụmọdụ gbasara ọchịchị na Republic nke abụọ bụ Mallam Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi
Umu agha ndi mmadu gburu di ya n'afo iri abuo na ato gara aga mgbe Mallam Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi nyere Emir nke Kano, Ado Bayero otu njuju.
Muhammed bụ nwunye Dr Bala Muhammed, onye ndụmọdụ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Gọvanọ Republic nke abụọ Mallam Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi
Ndị mmadụ butere ọgbaghara gburu di ya n'afọ iri abụọ na asatọ gara aga ka Mallam Muhammadu Abubakar Rimi nyechara Emir nke Kano, Ado Bayero ajụjụ.
